programme.title: Men's Bronze Medal Match IND-ESP | Hockey | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Bronze ,Medal Match with India and Spain took place on the 08/08/2024 at the Yves-du-Manoir Stadium - 2. Final Score IND 2:1 ESP.

programme.title: Personal Best: Paris 2024
programme.desc: Relive the Paris 2024 Olympic Games through the journeys of eight remarkable athletes who pushed past limits, defied expectations, and inspired the world. Featuring Noah Lyles, Faith Kipyegon, Jack Robinson, Huang Yaqiong and Zheng Siwei, Leon Marchand, Olga Kharlan and Cindy Ngamba.

programme.title: Hockey vs Cricket with Savita Punia and Smriti Mandhana | Sports Swap India
programme.desc: India’s national hockey team goalkeeper Savita Punia swaps her hockey stick for a cricket bat. Can her skills in hockey help her become a better cricketer?

programme.title: Mat B: Men's Greco-Roman & Women's Freestyle - Day 12 - Evening | Wrestling | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This session includes the Men's Greco-Roman 67kg and 87kg Semifinals and the Greco-Roman 77kg and 97kg Finals as well as the Women's Freestyle 53kg Semifinals and the Freestyle 50kg Finals.

programme.title: FRA-POL - Men's Gold Medal Match | Volleyball | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Gold Medal Match took place at South Paris Arena 1, Paris, on 10/08/2024. France won Gold with a final score FRA 3:0 POL.

programme.title: ESP-AUS - Women's Gold Medal Match | Water Polo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Gold Medal Match took place at Paris La Defense Arena, Paris, on 10/08/2024. Spain won Gold with a final score ESP 11:9 AUS.

programme.title: Women's Boulder & Lead Finals | Sport Climbing | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Boulder & Lead Finals took place at Le Bourget Climbing Venue, France, on 10/08/2024. Janja Garnbret (SLO) won the Gold with a total of 168.5 points. Brooke Raboutou (USA) won the Silver and Jessica Pilz (AUT) completed the podium.

programme.title: Duets Free Routine Final | Artistic Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Duets Free Routine Final took place at the Aquatics Centre, on 10/08/24. Liuyi Wang/Quianyi Wang (CHN) won Gold, Kate Shortman/Isabelle Thorpe (GBR) won Silver and Bregje de Brouwer/Noortje de Brouwer (NED) completed the podium.

programme.title: JPN-CHN - Women's Team Gold Medal Match | Table Tennis | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This Women's Team Gold Medal Match Japan v China, at South Paris Arena 4, Paris, on 10/08/24. Final score CHN 3:0 JPN.
China won Gold, Japan won Silver and South Korea won Bronze.

programme.title: B-Boys Final | Breaking | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The B-Boys Final took place on La Concorde 1, Paris, on 10/08/2024. Phil Wizard (CAN) won the Gold, Danny Dann (FRA) claimed the Silver, and Victor (USA) won the Bronze.

programme.title: French breakers set the scene for Paris 2024 Olympic Games| Breaking Life
programme.desc: France is a cultural melting pot. It’s also one of the biggest countries for Breaking with more than a thousand battles every year and some of the greatest international competitions. It’s also in Paris 2024 that Breaking will make its Olympic debut. Dany Dann came to France from French Guyana to pursue a life in dance. Now, he juggles early morning shifts as a nurse, daily training and being a father – always with an eye on the next battle. Now reigning national champion, he trains with French national team members B-Girl Carlota and B-Boy Marlone for the WDSF World Breaking Championship in Paris.

programme.title: Young breakers take over the streets of Medellin | Breaking Life
programme.desc: Colombia used to be one of the most dangerous countries in the world but has found new life through a revival in urban arts, becoming a global creative mecca. B-Girl Luma and 4Eskuela hip hop school, where she learnt Breaking and is now a teacher, have been instrumental to this change in Medellin (Colombia). But it’s not been an easy journey for Luma who also had her doubts about what she can really achieve through dancing. By winning international dance events around the world, she is now confident it gave her a career and a drive, also when teaching young kids in her neighbourhood. She is keen to participate to Paris 2024.

programme.title: Men's Final | Modern Pentathlon | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Modern Pentathlon Men's Final took place at Château de Versailles, Paris on 10/08/24. Ahmed Elgendy (EGY) won the Gold Medal, Taishu Sato (JPN) won the Silver medal and the Bronze medal was for Giorgio Malan (ITA).

programme.title: USA-FRA - Men's Gold Medal Game | Basketball | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Gold Medal Game took place at Bercy Arena, France, on 10/08/2024. The United States of America won the Gold with a final score: USA 98:87 FRA.

programme.title: Men's 10m Platform Final | Diving | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's 10m Platform Final took place at the Aquatics Centre, on 10/08/24. Yuan Cao (CHN) won Gold, Rikuto Tamai (JPN) won Silver and Noah Williams (GBR) completed the podium.

programme.title: FRA-POL - Men's Gold Medal Match | Volleyball | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Gold Medal Match took place at South Paris Arena 1, Paris, on 10/08/2024. France won Gold with a final score FRA 3:0 POL.

programme.title: ESP-AUS - Women's Gold Medal Match | Water Polo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Gold Medal Match took place at Paris La Defense Arena, Paris, on 10/08/2024. Spain won Gold with a final score ESP 11:9 AUS.

programme.title: ITA-USA - Women's Gold Medal Match | Volleyball | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Gold Medal Match took place at South Paris Arena 1, Paris, on 11/08/2024. Italy won Gold with a final score ITA 3:0 USA.

programme.title: Women's Omnium, Women's Sprint, Men's Keirin | Cycling Track | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session includes the Women's Omnium, the Women's Sprint and the Men's Keirin which took place at the Saint-Quentin-En-Yvelines Velodrome on 11/08/24.
The Men's Keirin was won by Harrie Lavreysen (NED) with Gold, Matthew Richardson (AUS) with Silver and Matthew Glaetzer (AUS) with Bronze.
The Women's Sprint was won by Ellesse Andrews (NZL) with Gold, Lea Friedrich (GER) with Silver and Emma Finucane (GBR) with Bronze.
The Women's Omnium was won by Jennifer Valente (USA) with Gold, Daria Pikulik (POL) with Silver and Ally Wollaston (NZL) with Bronze.

programme.title: USA-FRA - Women's Gold Medal Game | Basketball | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Gold Medal Game took place at Bercy Arena, France, on 11/08/2024. The United States of America won the Gold with a final score: USA 67:66 FRA.

programme.title: GER-DEN - Men's Gold Medal Match | Handball | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Men's Gold Medal Match took place at Pierre Mauroy Stadium on 11/08/24. Denmark won the match with a final score of GER 26:39 DEN.
Denmark won Gold, Germany won Silver and Spain won Bronze.

programme.title: ITA-USA - Women's Gold Medal Match | Volleyball | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Gold Medal Match took place at South Paris Arena 1, Paris, on 11/08/2024. Italy won Gold with a final score ITA 3:0 USA.

programme.title: CRO-SRB - Men's Gold Medal Match | Water Polo | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Gold Medal Match took place at Paris La Defense Arena, Paris, on 11/08/2024. Serbia won Gold with a final score SRB 13:11 CRO.

programme.title: Closing Ceremony | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: Experience the grandeur of the Paris 2024 Olympic Games closing ceremony. Relive the unforgettable moments that marked the end of a historic event in the City of Light.

programme.title: FRA-POL - Men's Gold Medal Match | Volleyball | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Gold Medal Match took place at South Paris Arena 1, Paris, on 10/08/2024. France won Gold with a final score FRA 3:0 POL.
